sect2.title: Installation de xpdf
sect2.para: Installez xpdf en lançant les commandes suivantes:

screen.userinput: cd xpdf && patch -Np1 -i ../../xpdf-2.01-patch1 && cd .. && ./configure --prefix=/usr --sysconfdir=/etc --mandir=/usr/share/man \ --with-freetype2-includes=/usr/include/freetype2 \ --with-freetype2-library=/usr/lib --with-gzip \ --with-appdef-dir=/usr/X11R6/lib/X11/app-defaults/ && make && make install
